rooms.description: North-facing entrance with floor-to-ceiling windows. Vastu compliant positioning, ensuring positive energy flow.
Spacious living area with large glass facade for natural light and scenic garden views.
Open plan dining space adjacent to the kitchen, following Scandinavian design aesthetics.
Modern kitchen with an island counter and ample storage, adhering to sustainable design principles.
A comfortable guest room designed with simplicity and functionality in mind.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a walk-in closet and a private balcony overlooking the garden.
Guest bedroom designed with Scandinavian minimalism and ample natural light.
Additional bedroom ensuring comfort for family members or guests.
